SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Brief Rationale for Protocol Modification;Brief Rationale for Protocol Revision
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A concise explanation justifying an individual change in the protocol.
A summarized explanation justifying a protocol amendment.

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: Protocol Amendment Approval by Sponsor Date;Study Protocol Version Approval Date
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: The date on which a version of the protocol was finalized or approved by the sponsor.
SKOS_CONCEPT.notation: Study Protocol Version Approval by Sponsor Date

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: A string of numerals that uniquely identifies a specific version of a study protocol.
